interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: N3 No Name Necessary Mattifying Shine and Oil Control Long Lasting Anti-aging Makeup Setting Spray (200ml)
Review Date: 2019/09/14
Store: No Name Necessary
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '1.7 x 1.7 x 7.5 inches; 0.81 Ounces'}
Review Text: This spray feels slightly like hairspray when you spritz it on. It helps makeup last all day and stay matte. I personally like a dewy finish so I spray this first for longevity, then when it dries I’ll spray a little dewy spray. Love the combo! Comes in a huge bottle that will last forever.
Review Title: Good spray for oily skin
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Makeup Preferences**: Prioritizes long-lasting makeup solutions with a focus on controlling shine and oil. 
- **Skin Type**: Likely has oily skin, as indicated by the need for products that offer mattifying effects. 
- **Finish Preference**: Enjoys a dewy finish in makeup looks, suggesting a flexible approach to layering products for desired effects. 
- **Product Packaging**: Values larger product sizes for longevity and cost-effectiveness. 
- **Review Behavior**: Provides constructive and balanced reviews, reflecting a pragmatic approach to product evaluations. 
- **Usage Technique**: Employs a combination of products, indicating a willingness to experiment with different textures and finishes for optimal results.
